title: Abu Dhabi sovereign fund commits $2 billion to Trump crypto venture
summary: Abu Dhabi's sovereign wealth fund MGX, led by royal family member Tahnoun bin Zayed Al Nahyan, commits $2 billion to purchase WLF's USD1 stablecoin for investing in Binance, with funds flowing directly to Trump-controlled entities.

sources.title: Trump-Tied Stablecoin Used for MGX's $2 Billion Binance Deal
Trump family crypto venture tapped as part of $2B Emirati-backed investment deal

notes: Massive foreign sovereign investment in Trump family crypto business
